validation.generalValidationError: Oops ... something went wrong interpreting this input.
validation.onlyMinusSign: A minus sign on its own is not a number.

validation.onlyDecimalSeparator: A decimal separator on its own is not a number.

validation.emptyExpression: There's (part of) an expression missing here.
validation.unmatchedClosingBracket: There is a closing bracket without corresponding opening bracket.
validation.unmatchedOpeningBracket: There is an opening bracket without corresponding closing bracket.
validation.plusAtStart: There is a plus symbol at the start.
validation.doublePlusMinus: There are two subsequent plus/minus symbols.
validation.plusMinusAtEnd: There is a <check><on-true>plus</on-true><on-false>minus</on-false></check> symbol at the end.
validation.timesAtStart: There is a multiplication symbol at the start of a term.
validation.doubleTimes: There are two subsequent multiplication symbols.
validation.timesAtEnd: There is a multiplication symbol at the end of a term.
validation.tooLongAccent: There is an accent with more than one character in it: "{contents}".
validation.singleDecimalSeparator: There is a decimal separator without numbers around it.
validation.multipleDecimalSeparator: There is a number with multiple decimal separators.
validation.misplacedSubscript: There is a subscript "{subscript}" without a variable.
validation.misplacedSuperscript: There is an exponent without a term prior to it.
validation.remaining: Failed to interpret what was written. There's something wrong with the notation used.

validation.emptyEquation: There's (part of) an equation missing here.
